name: Pisces Pisces
description:
Sail around different regions in your humble boat, taking photographs of fish, there are 80 different species, for money and knowledge. There are 4 fully 3D "Worlds" to explore; The Lake, The Tropics, The Ocean and The Abyss. The worlds are created randomly when you start a new game. But, dive under the waters and discover a whole new world filled with beautifully recreated fishes and scenery. This game also boasts 50 minutes of original music.

Made on 01 August 2010 for YoyoComp06
